swerai attan þeinana jah aiþein þeina.
MARK 10.20 þaruh andhafjands qaþ du imma:
laisari, þo alla gafastaida us jundai meinai.
MARK 10.21 iþ Iesus insaiƕands du imma frijoda ina jah qaþ du imma:
swa filu swe habais frabugei jah gif þarbam, jah habais huzd in himinam;
jah hiri laistjan mik nimands galgan.
MARK 10.22 iþ is gahnipnands in þis waurdis galaiþ gaurs;
MARK 10.23 jah bisaiƕands Iesus qaþ siponjam seinaim:
sai, ƕaiwa agluba þai faiho gahabandans in þiudangardja gudis galeiþand.
MARK 10.24 iþ þai siponjos afslauþnodedun in waurde is.
þaruh Iesus aftra andhafjands qaþ im:
barnilona, ƕaiwa aglu ist þaim hugjandam afar faihau in þiudangardja gudis galeiþan.
MARK 10.25 azitizo ist ulbandau þairh þairko neþlos galeiþan, þau gabigamma in þiudangardja gudis galeiþan.
MARK 10.26 iþ eis mais usgeisnodedun qiþandans du sis misso:
MARK 10.27 insaiƕands du im Iesus qaþ:
fram mannan unmahteig ist, akei ni fram guda;
allata auk mahteig ist fram guda.
MARK 10.28 dugann þan Paitrus qiþan du imma:
sai, weis aflailotum alla jah laistidedum þuk.

ni ƕashun ist saei aflailoti gard aiþþau broþruns aiþþau swistruns aiþþau aiþein aiþþau attan aiþþau qen aiþþau barna aiþþau haimoþlja in meina jah in þizos aiwaggeljons, MARK 10.30 saei ni andnimai ·r· falþ nu in þamma mela gardins jah broþruns jah swistruns jah attan jah aiþein jah barna jah haimoþlja miþ wrakom jah in aiwa þamma anawairþin libain aiweinon.
MARK 10.31 aþþan managai wairþand frumans aftumans, jah aftumans frumans.
MARK 10.32 wesun-uþ-þan ana wiga gaggandans du Iairusaulwmai jah was faurbigaggands ins Iesus, jah sildaleikidedun jah afarlaistjandans faurhtai waurþun.
jah andnimands aftra þans twalif dugann im qiþan þoei habaidedun ina gadaban. MARK 10.33 þatei

sai, usgaggam in Iairusaulwma jah sunus mans atgibada þaim ufargudjam jah bokarjam, jah gawargjand ina dauþau jah atgiband ina þiudom MARK 10.34 jah bilaikand ina jah bliggwand ina jah speiwand ana ina jah usqimand imma, jah þridjin daga ustandiþ.
MARK 10.35 jah athabaidedun sik du imma Iakobus jah Iohannes, sunjus Zaibaidaiaus, qiþandans:
laisari, wileima ei þatei þuk bidjos, taujais uggkis.
MARK 10.37 iþ eis qeþun du imma:
fragif ugkis ei ains af taihswon þeinai jah ains af hleidumein þeinai sitaiwa in wulþau þeinamma.
MARK 10.38 iþ Iesus qaþuh du im:
magutsu driggkan stikl þanei ik driggka, jah daupeinai þizaiei ik daupjada, ei daupjaindau?
MARK 10.39 iþ eis qeþun du imma:
sweþauh þana stikl þanei ik driggka, driggkats jah þizai daupeinai þizaiei ik daupjada daupjanda;
MARK 10.40 iþ þata du sitan af taihswon meinai aiþþau af hleidumein nist mein du giban, alja þaimei manwiþ was.
MARK 10.41 jah gahausjandans þai taihun dugunnun unwerjan bi Iakobu jah Iohannen.
MARK 10.42 iþ is athaitands ins qaþ du im:
wituþ þatei þaiei þuggkjand reikinon þiudom, gafraujinond im, iþ þai mikilans ize gawaldand im.
MARK 10.43 iþ ni swa sijai in izwis;
ak saƕazuh saei wili wairþan mikils in izwis, sijai izwar andbahts;
MARK 10.44 jah saei wili izwara wairþan frumists, sijai allaim skalks.
MARK 10.45 jah auk sunus mans ni qam at andbahtjam, ak andbahtjan jah giban saiwala seina faur managans lun.
jah usgaggandin imma jainþro miþ siponjam seinaim jah managein ganohai, sunus Teimaiaus, Barteimaius sa blinda, sat faur wig du aihtron.
MARK 10.47 jah gahausjands þatei Iesus sa Nazoraius ist, dugann hropjan jah qiþan:
